name: NLSQL
slogan: Natural Language to SQL | NLP to SQL API converter
description:
NLSQL is cognitive BI technology, which helps company employees to get information quickly and easily using only Natural Language.
NLSQL is an artificial intelligence-powered chatbot that uses natural language to query their database. Gathering and evaluating data to approve proposals, create a budget, or make a convincing business pitch can be quite extensive and time-consuming NLSQL, revolutionizes the way businesses handle data as the software is designed to speed up the data query process and automate other business workflows.

No longer do users need data scientists to analyze and dissect data to discover insights or obtain critical information to fuel their decisions. All they need to do is type in their questions and NLSQL delivers the answer on a silver platter. What they get is data that is very understandable and actionable, enabling users to make progress, improve their workflows, and drive sales among others.

team.name: Denis NLSQL
team.bioHtml: NLSQL is cognitive BI technology, which helps company employees to get information quickly and easily using only Natural Languagel

jobs.title: ABAP/SQL Developer
jobs.description:
Looking for ABAP / SQL developer to our product team based in Kiev.

Required:
5 years experience with SQL
3 years experience with SAP, ABAP
2 years experience with SAP RFC
experience with SAP HCM

No bullshit stuff, just really interesting project

jobs.title: Content Marketing Manager
jobs.description:
Do you believe humans are able to interact with database or ERP system by using only natural language? 
Are you ready for the challenges nobody had before?

If both abovementioned questions YES, that's position for you:

Content Marketing Manager will be responsible for developing magic content. 
This magic is measured by increasing website traffic, registrations and inbound leads as main KPIs for this position. In case your magic works, you can create this magic wherever you want.
Supporting existing content from the brief stage through execution and advertisement by using a huge range of marketing tools. 

Qualifications:
• Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience
• Content Marketing experience
• Fluent English writing skills
• Open minded
• Positive thinking

Email your CV to denis(at)nlsql.com

By applying for this position please share 1 example of your English text post on Reddit, Quora, Medium, Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, etc.

jobs.title: Local Sales Manager
jobs.description:
Do you believe humans are able to interact with database or ERP system by using only natural language? 
Are you ready for the challenges nobody had before?

If both abovementioned questions YES, that's position for you:

Looking for experienced SDR in B2B software sales.

In case we choose, you don't need to take care of prospects at all. All prospects and leads are generating in-house as per your requirements. You need just negotiate and get the deal closed.

That might be a side and commision based IT B2B sales project for you.

In case you are interested, send your CV to denis(at)nlsql.com
